TopicTitle: Crew Visit Module Single-Stage to Orbit Spacecraft

Articles.Content:
Hello KSP'ers,

Just thought I should share probably my most efficient spacecraft.

It can send up to 10 kerbals to low kerbin orbit (<110km) using just one "32" tanks of fuel.

It has a large SABRE engine from B9 Aerospace, and two turbojet engines.

It is reusable with KAS and if you load it up with kerbals on the ground, however I have never done this, I don't like having loads of parts right near where I already launch 32-bit annihilating, KSP-crumbling, CPU-apocalypse-causing, 500 part interstellar rockets...

Anyway, here are some nice photos for you to enjoy, and maybe get some inspiration from...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Drop me a question if you have any, and if you want, leave some feedback.

SamboUK96
